resources.string: The criminal brothers Seth and Richie Gecko, fleeing from the law, take the Fuller family as hostages and head towards the Mexican border. They decide to stop at a nightclub called Titty Twister, seemingly a den of iniquity. However, when night falls, the place turns into a literal hell, inhabited by blood-thirsty vampires. The survivors must join forces to survive until dawn.

Father Ángel Berriatúa, a Basque priest, deciphers the apocalyptic code in the Book of Revelation and comes to the conclusion that the Antichrist will be born in Madrid on December 25th. With the intention of stopping this event, Father Ángel decides to renounce his religious life and perform impure acts to gain the favor of the Devil and find the Antichrist. Along with a death metal fanatic named José María and an occultism professor, they embark on a mission to prevent the end of the world.

Isi and Disi, two Spanish heavy metal enthusiasts, embark on a new adventure. This time, the plot revolves around the participation of the band Dinosaurio (led by Isi and Disi) in a musical competition called High Voltage. As they strive to win the contest and achieve fame, they find themselves involved in comic and absurd situations. The film combines irreverent humor with a passion for rock music.

Snowpiercer is set in a dystopian future where a failed attempt to counteract global warming has plunged the Earth into perpetual winter. The only human survival exists on a train called Snowpiercer, which travels around the world and houses the last living people. Society on the train is divided into classes, with the rich at the front and the poor at the back. Curtis Everett, a man from the tail section, leads a rebellion to advance toward the front of the train, facing numerous challenges and uncovering dark secrets about the true nature of the train.

Dom Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio) is a skilled thief specializing in the art of extraction, stealing valuable secrets from the subconscious during dreams. Now, he faces a unique challenge: implanting an idea instead of stealing it, known as "inception." Directed by Christopher Nolan, this science fiction film explores the complexity of the human mind and reality.

Directed by Quentin Tarantino, "Pulp Fiction" is a postmodern masterpiece that intertwines various stories in Los Angeles. With a stellar cast, including John Travolta and Uma Thurman, the film follows intriguing characters through peculiar situations, exploring themes of violence, redemption, and pop culture.

Adapted from a Stephen King story, this film directed by Frank Darabont follows the life of Andy Dufresne (Tim Robbins), a banker wrongly convicted. In Shawshank prison, he forges unusual friendships and uses his wits to confront injustice while dreaming of freedom.

Directed by the Wachowski siblings, "The Matrix" is a groundbreaking science fiction film that follows Neo (Keanu Reeves), a hacker who discovers the truth behind the apparent reality. In a world controlled by machines, Neo becomes the destined hero to free humanity.
Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

A modern love and ambition story set in Los Angeles, directed by Michel Gondry. The film follows Mia (Emma Stone), an aspiring actress, and Sebastian (Ryan Gosling), a jazz pianist, as they pursue their dreams and face the challenges posed by the fame and reality of the entertainment industry.
